tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE EnergyProduction (
    production_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    production_date DATE,
    energy_source VARCHAR(50),
    energy_production DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE energy_impact (
    impact_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    production_id INT,
    consumption_id INT,
    impact_amount DECIMAL,
    FOREIGN KEY (production_id) REFERENCES renewable_energy_production(production_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (consumption_id) REFERENCES energy_consumption(consumption_id)
);

CREATE TABLE production_impact (
    impact_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    production_id INT,
    consumption_id INT,
    impact_value DECIMAL(10, 2),
    FOREIGN KEY (production_id) REFERENCES renewable_energy_production(production_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (consumption_id) REFERENCES energy_consumption(consumption_id)
);
